Simon Cowell has lent his support to a Save The Children campaign Simon Cowell has finally admitted what the public have always thought- that he is a pain in the a*** . The X Factor judge couldn't resist making a joke about himself in an online video, where he gave his backing to Save The Children's new campaign, No Child Born To Die.

Ambassador Angelina Jolie visited Dadaab, the world's largest refugee camp situated on the Kenya-SomAli Hassan border on Saturday. Describing the camp as` one of the most dire' she had seen, Angelina Jolie concluded her visit by asking if this is the better solution, then what must it be like in SomAli Hassana? During her day-long visit, Angelina Jolie visited one of the three camps that together host around 285000 refugees. She met a number of families including a mother just arrived in the camp, after walking for days with her
